channel.title: System designs on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in System designs on My New Hugo Site

item.title: CAP
item.description: CAP Theorm C - Consistency Data returned is the latest whenever it is requested. Ways to achieve consistenty Read after Write Consistency A new data is acknowledged to be written only when the data is written to all the nodes/subset of nodes in the system. A - Availability Data is returned whenever it is requested for. Ways to acheive availability Have multiple replicas of nodes in the system.
